author: markt
msg: Fix intermittent unit test failure for
Previously either the running or close field could end the loop but only
close performed the necessary clean-up. This patch removes the ability
for running to end the loop.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-4588: Converting to DOMSource should accept Node instead of Document, as it can then accept more types.
